name: Star Trooper
estimated_assembly_time: 1 Hour (painting and glue drying time not included)
launch_system: Porta-Pad II and Electron Beam Launch Controller
age_recommendation: Estes model rocketry is recommended for boys and girls ages 10+ with adult supervision for those under 12, and rocketeers of all ages.
description: Cruise the galaxy in style with the Star Trooper. This small rocket is able to fly up to 900 feet. It is a great rocket for beginners or any rocketeer looking to spice up their collection.
